trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_SEQ_00<tab>Edalene of Crescent Cove seeks help removing debris caught in her nets.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_SEQ_01<tab>Edalene's trawling nets have become clogged with debris from the sea bottom. Aid her by removing whatever flotsam you can find.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_SEQ_02<tab>You have picked the nets clean. Speak with Edalene once more.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_SEQ_03<tab>After expressing her gratitude, Edalene goes on about how the life of a fishwife is one of repairing nets and praying for calm waters and large hauls.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_TODO_00<tab>Remove debris from the trawling nets.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_EDALENE_000<tab>Have you some time to spare an old fishwife, friend? I've nets what need tendin', as you can probably tell.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_EDALENE_001<tab>These nets you see hangin' here are used to haul in fish. Problem is, in the doin', they dredge up all manner of junk from the sea bottom.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_EDALENE_002<tab>I'd be grateful if you'd pick any debris from them you might find.
TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_EDALENE_010<tab>Thank you, dear. That's one less chore what needs seein' to.

TEXT_SUBWIL094_00506_EDALENE_011<tab>I tell you, 'tis no easy thing bein' a fishwife. When not mendin' nets and patchin' sails, I'm prayin' to Llymlaen for still waters and a hearty haul. Still, I wouldn't trade all the hard work for anything.
